dialogue: This portfolio was build with React and Phaser, which is a Javascript library used to build video games, talk to other NPC's and enter the buildings in this town to learn more about Javi
Javi knows Javascript/Typescript, the libraries and frameworks he knows are: React, a little bit of Angular, Phaser, express, and socket.io
Enter this house to access the library and use the computer. you can press the up key to use the doors in this game
Enter this house to learn more about the projects Javi has worked on
Enter Javi's house and learn more about him
